page.title: 02LIFE STYLES - DAILY LIFE
page.content:
THE AFTER SCHOOL LIFE OF
GEMMA DIAMOND-AGED TWELVE.
WHEN I GOT HOME TODAY,LIKE ANY TYPICAL DAY,I GOT DRESSED TO GO TO SQUASH.I LIKE THIS GAME A LOT,AND HAVE BEEN PLAYING IT FOR TWO YEARS.I INTEND TO KEEP PLAYING IT FOR ANOTHER TWENTY OR THIRTY YEARS.IT IS FIFTEEN MINUTES TO HADLEIGH,WHERE I PLAY.I ALSO PLAY AT LEXDEN,AT THE SUPER SQUASH CLUB.WHEN I GOT THERE,I HAD TO WAIT FOR HALF AN HOUR FOR MY COACHING.SO I PRACTICED ON MY OWN.I CAME OFF FOR A REST AND A DRINK,BEFORE HAVING MY COACHING WITH AHMED SAFWAT,THE CLUB PROFESSIONAL.HE IS A BRILLIANT COACH AND HE WAS NUMBER FIFTEEN IN THE WORLD ONCE.I HAVE FORTY MINUTES COACHING,WHICH COSTS FIVE POUNDS,AND THEN WAIT FOR MY DAD TO COME AND PICK ME UP AND DRIVE ME HOME.
